title: SBI raises Rs 7500 crore through tier-II bonds
description: State Bank of India has raised Rs 7,500 crore through Basel III compliant tier 2 bonds at a 7.42% annual rate. This 15-year bond has a call option after 10 years.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
